Package org.texgen.textures.uv

Textures the modify the U,V inputs and then use those values to call the source texture.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
UVNoise UVNoise takes u,v input and maps it to new u,v values based on a noise function.
UVNoiseTranslate Takes the U,V values and adjusts them by a noise function, and uses the new U,V to get the result from a source texture.
UVRotate Rotates the U,V co-ordinates around the 0,0 position.
UVScale Takes the input U,V values, scales them and fetches the result from the source signal
UVTransformer Texture that allows you to scale, rotate and transform the source texture
UVTranslate Takes the input U,V values, scales them and fetches the result from the source signal
 

Package org.texgen.textures.uv Description

Textures the modify the U,V inputs and then use those values to call the source texture.
